title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Returns to Theaters With Sing-Along Version: Here’s How to Get Tickets Before They Sell Out
summary: Jam out to songs such as "Golden" with fellow fans.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Back by popular demand, the KPop Demon Hunters sing-along will be in theaters again this Halloween weekend, and we’re showing you how you can snag tickets. Prep your vocals to jam out to chart-topping songs such as “Golden” with fellow fans. Tickets for the full-length sing-along version are already available for eager fans to buy right now with Fandango . The event will take place at a theater near you, including chains including AMC, Regal and Cinemark, and in select theaters, starting Friday, Oct. 31, through Sunday, Nov. 2. Through Fandango, you can search screenings by city, state or zip code, giving you the best chance at seeing the sing-along where it’s convenient. The film will also be available to fans in Canada, and internationally, including the U.K., Ireland, Korea, Spain, Germany, the Netherlands, Brazil, Mexico, Argentina, Chile, Australia and New Zealand. You’ll want to act fast — tickets for the la…
